Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security (CARES) Act (P.L. 116-136); Families First Coronvirus Reponse Act (P.L. 116-127); Coronvirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act (P.L. 116-123); Paycheck Protection Program and Health Care Enhancement Act (P.L. 116-139); 340B; White House Nursing Home COVID Task Force; CY 2021 Medicare Advantage/Part D Final Rate Notice;  PCORI Nomination; FCC COVID-19 Telehealth Program Funding; TREATS, CONNECT Act, Protecting Access to Post COVID 19 Telehealth Act, RUSH Act. General advocacy for continued and enhanced telehealth under the COVID-19 PHE and once the current PHE ends.
